mapper.select: SELECT d.platform_id,d.game_id,d.point,d.status,d.update_date,d.insert_date,p.name as platformName,g.name as gameName, u1.name as updateUser,u2.name as insertUser FROM discount d LEFT JOIN gaming_platform p ON d.platform_id = p.id LEFT JOIN game g ON g.id = d.game_id LEFT JOIN users u1 on d.update_user = u1.id LEFT JOIN users u2 on d.insert_user = u2.id WHERE d.platform_id = #{platformId} AND d.game_id = #{gameId}
